A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: When the dust settles I think most people will put this on a par with the prequels. It simply doesn't answer or even attemp to answer any of the interesting questions raised in The Force Awakens.... who are Reys parents? who is Snoke? Who are the Knights of Ren? unfortunately we still have absolutely no idea! And don't get me started on the slapstick humour........
